text.text_translated: People might not understand that they are part of the problem with clothes, because they give their old clothes to charity shops. However, charity shops cannot sell all the clothes that people do not want. 'Fast fashion', which means cheap clothes that go out of style very quickly, is often too poor quality to recycle. Because of this, people do not want to buy these clothes second-hand. So, huge amounts of clothes finally go into the rubbish. Also, many clothes that charity shops cannot sell are sent to other countries, and this creates even more money and nature problems.
